summary: Joan Elizabeth Osborne  is an American singer-songwriter who has had several hit songs.
full_text: Joan Elizabeth Osborne  is an American singer-songwriter and interpreter of music, having recorded and performed in various popular American musical genres including pop, soul, R&B, blues and country. She is best known for her recording of the Eric Bazilian song "One of Us". She has toured with Motown sidemen the Funk Brothers and was featured in the documentary film about them, Standing in the Shadows of Motown.
title: Joan Osborne
